医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究将ITSN1基因变体与帕金森氏病风险增加一项在细胞报告中发表的新研究揭示了将基因ITSN1中的遗传变异与帕金森氏病的风险显着升高的突破性发现，这是一种神经退行性疾病，影响了近2％的65岁成年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/study-links-itsn1-gener-variants-to incred-parkinsons-parkinsons-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/study-links-itsn1-geniants-to incred-parkinsons-parkinsons-disease-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e331E5B6-33CB-4969-907C-9631EFBCD236 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 23:03:42 -0500 Study links ITSN1 gene variants to increased Parkinson's disease risk
评估ALS患者的电针和中草药对肠道菌群的综合作用最近的研究强调了肌萎缩性侧索硬化症（ALS）和肠道菌群之间的联系。这项前瞻性研究旨在评估电针作用以及中草药对ALS患者肠道菌群和代谢组学的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/evaluating-the-combine-combine-comb-----------------of-electroculcuncunculcunculture-and-chinese-herbal-herbal-medicine-microbobiota-in-n-n-al-al-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/evaluating-the-combine-combine-combine--f----------------------of-electroactunculcundure-and-chinese-herbal-herbal-medicine-microbobiota-in-robobiota-in-an-al-al-al-patients.aspx#comment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d6E5A88-7112-48B7-92FA-82457639A37E Fri, 07 Mar 2025 22:52:40 -0500 Evaluating the combined effect of electroacupuncture and Chinese herbal medicine on gut microbiota in ALS patients
GIF可以改善专业女性足球运动员的睡眠肯特大学自然科学学院的最新研究发现，称为GIFS（图形互换格式）的简短动画可以改善专业女性足球运动员的睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/gifs-can-improve-the-sleep-sleep-of-professional-female-footballers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/gifs-can-improve-the-sleep-sleep-of-professional-female-footballers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77f4e658-BC31-48FA-9DC7-5E4630E62CFA Fri, 07 Mar 2025 22:46:37 -0500 GIFs can improve the sleep of professional female footballers
为道德和有效的个性化营养建立的新框架近年来，个性化营养（PN）作为健康结果的定制方法已广受欢迎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/new-framework-estrable-for-ethor-thical-andical-and-meffective-and-pecective-nutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/new-framework-estrable-for-ethical-andical-and-meffective-persective-personalized-nutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fa70512-665c-4dd5-85a8-85a8-6aa3f2e1e3cc Fri, 07 Mar 2025 22:41:00 -0500 New framework established for ethical and effective personalized nutrition
环境因素在认知下降和痴呆症风险中起关键作用佐治亚大学公共卫生学院的一项新研究重点是我们周围环境在塑造痴呆症风险中发挥的强大作用。在卫生政策和管理助理教授Suhang Song的带领下，这项荟萃分析表明，包括空气污染和获得绿色或蓝色空间在内的因素可以显着提高或降低认知能力下降和发展痴呆的几率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/envorirnmental-factors-play-key---------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/environmental-factors-play-key-play-key-reole-in-cognitive-in-cognitive-decline-decline-decline-decline-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad185f89-1da9-413f-99EE-A1F1D85D56AE Fri, 07 Mar 2025 22:34:38 -0500 Environmental factors play key role in cognitive decline and dementia risk
研究确定了改善低出生体重儿童的学校准备的关键因素根据美国儿科学会（AAP）的数据，学校的准备是对儿童健康的核心，不仅可以预测学术，而且还可以预测长期的经济和健康成果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/study-indistifies-key-factors-to--Improve-school-school-school-readiness-for----------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/study-indistifies-key-factors-to--improve-school-school-school-redines-for---------------------------------- asspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89dd4ae6-4CFC-41A0-AD00-AD00-2A31932E307A Fri, 07 Mar 2025 22:07:32 -0500 Study identifies key factors to improve school readiness for low birth weight children
儿童早期的氟化物暴露可能会损害认知能力氟化物的浓度升高可能发生在井水中，在某些国家，它被添加到饮用水中以抵消人口中的龋齿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/fluoride-exposure-during-during-early-childhood-may-harm-cognative-abilities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/fluoride-exposure-during-during-early-childhood-may-harm-cognative-abilities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc6d2578-1fe5-40bf-9780-499601309fad Fri, 07 Mar 2025 22:04:27 -0500 Fluoride exposure during early childhood may harm cognitive abilities
新传感器可快速检测空气传播的鸟类流感病毒最近发生高度致病性禽流感（也称为鸟流感）的爆发引起了快速和敏感的检测方法来减轻其扩散的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/new-sensor-offers-rapid-detection-rapid-detection-of-airborne-bird-bird-flu-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/new-sensor-offers-rapid-detection-rapid-detection-olborne-bird-bird-flu-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68375E25-d8c2-4c47-9f3e-4bf450e81923 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 21:59:40 -0500 New sensor offers rapid detection of airborne bird flu virus
Insilico Medicine的AI驱动药物Rentosertib收到了官方通用名称Insilico Medicine（“ Insilico”）是一家临床阶段生成人工智能（AI）驱动的生物技术公司，最近宣布，其特发性肺纤维化（IPF）的突破性药物候选药物（IPF） - Rentosertib - Rentosertib（以ISM001-055的名字闻名，已被授予美国官方名称（曾经被称为ISM001-055），该名称是由美国官方的名字（United nestial Counce）（United Anternational Counce）（USENDENDENDEND）（USENDENEN COLDAN CONDENS COLDENS）（USENDENTIND ANTISE COLDAN）（USENDENDENTIND COLDAN）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/insilico-medicines-ai-ai-driven-drug-rentog-rentosertib-rentib-receives-finceincial-name.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/insilico-medicines-medicines-ai-ai-driven-drug-rentog-rentosertib-rentib-receives-finceive-fincial-generic-name.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e8b12d9-2764-42fa-b6eb-7928abe5b226 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 08:06:05 -0500 Insilico Medicine's AI-driven drug Rentosertib receives official generic name
试验显示，速度食品标签减少了学校的含糖食品新的研究发现，在英国中学进行了替代食品标签的试验，该试验显示了燃烧卡路里所需的体育锻炼的时间数 - 减少了对含糖食品的购买量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/trial-shows-pace-food-labeling-labeling-reduces-sgary-food-food-purchases-in-schools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/trial-shows-pace-pace-food-labeling-labeling-reduces-sugary-food-purchases-in-schools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=533727A7-A203-4339-AA31-EA31-E3F2A407D367 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 08:01:32 -0500 Trial shows PACE food labeling reduces sugary food purchases in schools
